#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		char a[1001];
		cin>>a;
		int l,count=0,j;
		l=j=strlen(a);
		j=j-1;
		for(int i=0;i<l/2;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]!=a[j--])
			count++;
			if(count>1)
			break;
		}
		if(count<=1)
		cout<<"yes"<<"\n";
		else
		cout<<"no"<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
